comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: @hflexgrig this looks like you are missing the GTK renderers. Unfortunately, I just haven't gotten around to that yet. See this issue: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/379 If you really need to use GTK, you can have a go at creating your own renderers or giving https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/379 a thumbs up to show support. As the votes come in, it moves up the list.
